Zerra & Co Green Tea Radiance Mask

Brand: Zerra & Co

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Organic Aloe Leaf Juice, Hydroxyethyl Cellulose, Phenoxyethanol, Glycerin, Organic Pineapple Fruit Extract, Organic Papaya Fruit Extract, Organic Papaya Leaf Extract, Green Tea Extract, Organic Alcohol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate
